title: If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
OB: When accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, the server returns an HTTP code 200 OK response with no content.
EB: The server should return an HTTP error 404 response when accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed.
SR:
1. Download the Tomcat 7 v7.0.0beta binary distribution from http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed
3. Access a URL on the Tomcat instance
